title: How to Join an Online Gaming League

steps.headline: Determine what game you would be interested playing often.
Find a league service provider like GreatLeague.com, TWL, LadderStats, Case's Ladder, Myleague, or rankmonster.com
Search to see if your game of choice is offered.
steps.description: If your game is there, be sure your gaming service/site is listed (i.e. Yahoo, Pogo, etc.). If using one of the sites listed in step 2, you should now see a list of all the leagues that fit your specifications. (There could be many leagues or only one.)

steps.headline: Examine the descriptions of several of the top leagues.
steps.description: Look for a league that looks inviting.

steps.headline: Click on the link for that league; you will be taken to that league's website.
Click free sign up on the left to join the league!
steps.description: Be sure to register with the exact name you use in the gaming service so that people will know who you are.

steps.headline: Go into the league's lobby and ask for a game or look for information on tournaments!

text: Determine what game you would be interested playing often.  Find a league service provider like GreatLeague.com, TWL, LadderStats, Case's Ladder, Myleague, or rankmonster.com  Search to see if your game of choice is offered. If your game is there, be sure your gaming service/site is listed (i.e. Yahoo, Pogo, etc.). If using one of the sites listed in step 2, you should now see a list of all the leagues that fit your specifications. (There could be many leagues or only one.) Examine the descriptions of several of the top leagues. Look for a league that looks inviting. Click on the link for that league; you will be taken to that league's website.  Click free sign up on the left to join the league! Be sure to register with the exact name you use in the gaming service so that people will know who you are. Go into the league's lobby and ask for a game or look for information on tournaments!
